resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  <identifier>
    <catalog>OpenLearn</catalog>
    <entry>iSpot</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:iSpot</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>iSpot</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">iSpot: Sharing nature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">iSpot: Teilen der Natur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">iSpot : Partage de la nature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">iSpot: Compartilhando da natureza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">iSpot: Compartecipazione della natura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">iSpot: Διανομή της φύσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">iSpot: Compartir la naturaleza</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit provides a valuable resource for anyone with an interest in nature. It will give you the opportunity to learn more about wildlife, and to share your interest with a wider community.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit versieht ein wertvolles 
Hilfsmittel für jedermann mit einem Interesse an der Natur. Sie
gibt Ihnen die Gelegenheit, mehr über Wildnis zu erlernen, und Ihr 
Interesse mit einer breiteren Gemeinschaft zu teilen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité fournit une ressource valable pour 
n'importe qui en intérêt pour la nature. Elle vous donnera 
l'occasion d'apprendre plus au sujet de la faune, et de partager votre
intérêt avec une communauté plus large.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade fornece um recurso valioso para 
qualquer um com um interesse na natureza. Dar-lhe-á a 
oportunidade de aprender mais sobre animais selvagens, e de 
compartilhar de seu interesse com uma comunidade mais larga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità fornisce una risorsa importante per 
chiunque un interesse in natura. Vi darà l'occasione imparare 
più circa fauna selvatica e ripartire il vostro interesse con una 
Comunità più larga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα παρέχει ένα πολύτιμο στοιχείο 
συμπεριφοράς για καθένα με ένα ενδιαφέρον για τη φύση. Θα 
σας δώσει την ευκαιρία να μάθει περισσότερους για την άγρια 
φύση, και να μοιραστεί το ενδιαφέρον σας με μια ευρύτερη 
κοινότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad proporciona a un recurso valioso para 
cualquier persona de un interés en naturaleza. Le dará la 
oportunidad de aprender más sobre fauna, y de compartir su interés 
con una comunidad más ancha.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e natureza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Natureza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e natura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Natura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και φύση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
